import React from 'react' function Room({ room }) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> Modal heading Woohoo, you are reading this text in a modal! ); return (

{room.name}

Type: {room.roomType}

Max Count: {room.maxCount}

Phone Number: {room.phoneNumber}

Email: {room.email}

Rent Per Day: {room.rentPerDay} INR

) } export default Room;
